Name: Beam Cat
About the game: Use your mighty beam to ascend the stars! The outer space colonies have collapsed in a great cat-tastrophy and it is your job as a Seeker to search out and rescue any survivors and bring them home. Beam Cat is a challenging platformer game where you charge a laser cannon to propel yourself or to slay your enemies. Climb to the top of the map to escape with your rescued brethren.
